divs: sighting detailsi was comming home from visiting my parents with my daughter. when we reachedmy house we pulled into the garage like always. i thought i would show my 2 y\odaughter some stars in the back yard. this is when i looked up and noticed agreyish large v-shaped object traveling extreemly fast in a staight path. nonoise at all were heard, and i feel the object was low enough that any typicalaircraft would be heard. the sighting only lasted about 4-5 secconds because ofthe tree line . definitely a strange calm and quiet atmosphere around us whenthis happened. thank you.....vincent b. bucy
